question:
####UFAQ [Damon Stone]
There are four NetChips installed, and one of them is hosting an [Endless Hunger](/en/card/09033). A different NetChip is trashed. Is the Endless Hunger trashed as a result?
answer:
Yes, as the hosting restriction applies at all times. Cards can host any other game object by default, but abilities can define limitations on the capability to host.

There are four NetChips installed, and one of them is hosting an Endless Hunger. At the start of the Runnerâ€™s turn, [Dr. Lovegood](/en/card/09042) blanks the text of that NetChip. Is the Endless Hunger trashed as a result?
